question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Indian Veterinary Research Institute - Bareilly
  2. National Sugar Institute (NSI) - Kanpur
  3. Central Food Technological Research Institute - Mysore
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Indian Veterinary Research Institute is located at Izatnagar, Bareilly. The National Sugar Institute (NSI) established in 1936 in Kanpur. Central Food Technological Research Institute is a premier Research Institution under the Council of Scientific & Industrial Research (CSIR).
